text: Hi i'm new in HubSpot and i'm trying to create an app that when people can download it will offer some cards for a workflow in HubSpot, i don't know where should i config this because i my app section, i can't find anything like workflow actions, how should i config my app so i can offer workflow cards to customers?

Hello Everyone!!! Does form scope in the HubSpot token is available for free accounts? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth#:~:text=to><https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth#:~:text=to%20your%20app.-,Scopes,depends%20on%20HubSpot%20account%20tier| your app.-,Scopes,depends on HubSpot account tier> In this link, mentioned as any account also <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As><https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As%20this%20API%20is%20authenticated%2C| this API is authenticated,> In this link free and starter , mentioned as Free/Starter accounts: 100 requests/10 seconds
